<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="55442" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="55442" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.65</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="707">707</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="72"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Heartless Helen</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Floral fragrance for women. <b>Heartless Helen</b> was launched in 2019. Top note is Mandarin Orange; middle note is Tuberose; base note is Woodsy Notes. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a     <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2358925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358925" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DISFRAG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DISFRAG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180575">DISFRAG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminded me of Loewe Ella Elixir but with more mandarin and not that strong as Loewe. Still very good. I would consider it unisex</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2358925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2358925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323574" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323574" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323574ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323574" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 04:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think that's Penhaligon's style, simple and direct. So if it's rose, it's rose. Jasmine is jasmine. Citrus is lemon and tuberose is tuberosa. <br />
<br />
Anyway, about Helen;<br />
Citrusy, clean, aquatic, minty tuberose. Very interestingly, I like it. The best tuberose I tried (which I will buy soon) was Nishane - Tuberoza X, which brought me a little closer to the tuberose I was already cold to. However, maybe my prejudices can be broken because this is a tuberose without any trace of plastic. I tried a scent called Marfa, it was a bit close to this one, but it was creamier and weaker. Still a bit too fresh for my taste. I think I will use it from my sample set but I won't buy a full bottle. <br />
<br />
By the way, I didn't find the tuberose here indolic. For some reason, the animalic accord is automatically put for the scent with tuberose and jasmine. It's actually confusing.<br />
<br />
See:<br />
https://boisdejasmin.com/2011/03/perfume-vocabulary-fragrance-notes-indole-indolic.html</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2323574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2323574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275999" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275999" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Demani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2246156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Demani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275999ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275999" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156">Demani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first fragrance that made me like and appreciate the unique smell of tuberose<br />
Mandarin and oranage blossom (not listed) opening with bubblegummy tuberose<br />
Tuberose is nicely grounded with fruity notes and woody bade notes so it is not overpowering<br />
Overall it's a nice white floral, very feminine</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2275999"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2275999#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mv88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193723"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1193723.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mv88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193723">mv88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 05:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kind of a tuberose bubblegum with the slightest hit of mint -- like Pepto Bismol (which I actually find pleasant).<br />
Sillage &amp; longevity both pretty bad, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2265669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2265669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264845" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264845" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SSBurn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298438"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298438.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SSBurn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-20139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk"title="Choco Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264845ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264845" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298438">SSBurn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice scent. Very very light!  Not worth the money IMO there are much better tuberose scents. This isnt a hate but its not anything special</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2264845"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2264845#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2255073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255073" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 06:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heartless Helen is a simple tuberose scent, decent and pleasant, but nothing groundbreaking. It is a sweet, clean, fruity white floral, muted and polite. Tuberose is multifaceted, and in different scents it can present as being much headier, appearing camphorous/waxy/fleshy at different times, but here it is mild, sweet and clean.<br />
<br />
HH is a white floral scent throughout, with tuberose dominant from initial spray. Sweet, juicy orange is evident up top, adding a nice fruity quality to the tuberose. It feels a little tropical here, almost like orange blossom. <br />
<br />
The tuberose becomes more bubblegum-like as it develops and the orange subsides, still sweet but more full-bodied. It becomes sweetly musky as it dries down, with some soft woodiness evident at the later stages. Sillage and longevity are moderate. It is a feminine spring/summer day-to-night scent.<br />
<br />
A pleasant, polite take on tuberose, this is a sweet white floral scent without being a gourmand. Not a definitive tuberose scent for me - there are many others I prefer, and this is also expensive for what it is. 3/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2255073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2255073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194722" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194722" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WitchQueen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WitchQueen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194722ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194722" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970">WitchQueen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 20:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, my favorite tuberose scent ever and the perfect summer night scent-10/10. I tried to like Memo's Martha but that has a cigarette smoke quality to it, but Heartless Helen is clean, creamy, a little salty and sexy. I went through my sample of Carnal Flower before I got this, but if memory serves, this is more approachable with a more intimate sillage. Maybe old Penny's will have a 50% off sale and I'll think about buying it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2194722"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2194722#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159941" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159941" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="michaeld2986"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232773"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1232773.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="michaeld2986" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/CH-Birds-Of-Paradise-For-Him-92688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CH Birds Of Paradise For Him"title="CH Birds Of Paradise For Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159941ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159941" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232773">michaeld2986</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 07:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is more of a concept than a perfume really. The tuberose is definitely the show stopper and takes center stage throughout the life of the fragrance. Someone in another review mentioned it smells expensive and I agree 100%. This is not a low-quality fragrance, but regardless the performance is not great for the money. I own a full bottle and tend to reach for it on warm rainy days. I get about 4 hours longevity and then it's gone. My overall feelings about it are just "meh"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2159941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2159941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133776" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133776" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ziva99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ziva99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133776ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133776" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); I couldnt like this one. <br />
<br />
If you are looking for gourmand tuberose perfume, I recommend Le Couvent  Maison de Parfums Tuberosa by Jean-Claude Ellena. Its much better price and having depths.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2133776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2133776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Tubie and woods tend dominate towards the end in the dry down which is perfectly fine with me!!! What could you ask more? padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853752">mmiamuse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-29">02/29/24 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A clean floral with bitter orange. I like this fragrance but I think I'd enjoy this more when the summer hits! If you don't like tuberose you may not like this. However, to my nose I pick up more bitter orange (reminiscent of fresh orange peels) and something creamy. Tuberose can lean a little mature to many people but I think the bitter orange and whatever note is coming through as creamy to my nose...helps to give it a younger aura. This reminds me of Holiday by HOS.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2078158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2078158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2014718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2014718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2014718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-29">12/29/23 19:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hi Helen<br />
What I mostly got in the opening was lots of fennel, with a liquorice-y-ness.<br />
I get a bit of orange/mandarin, but more of a slightly bitter orange cooking essence, rather than fresh fruit.<br />
There's a soapy, almost detergent element here that I'm not loving, catches in my throat a bit.<br />
<br />
As it softens down the tuberose becomes very apparent. While I generally really enjoy tuberose, I feel that Helen is missing some of the context surrounding the tuberose note that would make it more enjoyable. A soft, vague, creamy muskiness underneath which is very much ... fine.<br />
<br />
Pretty poor performance. I saw a review here where someone described this as very scented-candle like, which is absolutely spot on.<br />
<br />
VERDICT: Hi Helen. Bye Helen.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="2014718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=2014718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014007" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1998700" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="babypong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1869030.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="babypong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-62-56062.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56062.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '62"title="Cheirosa '62"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1998700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1998700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869030">babypong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>definitely tuberose and mandarin heavy. Very little woody base note comes through, I also get some slight pink peppercorn like another user mentioned. It has moderate silage but only for 45 minutes, then nothing. Generally creamy and fruity floral scent. It smells good, but it's not really something I want to wear again. I have to respray like every hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1998700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1998700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994303" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dokei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dokei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Journey-Man-25251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Journey Man"title="Journey Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656862">dokei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 14:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a tuberose fragrance, i expected something more complex or at least a bit more deep. But that isnt the case.<br />
It is lovely for what it is and for the hour that i can smell it. But it gets quite boring its just a bit bland for me.<br />
<br />
Its milky and sweet in a good way.<br />
<br />
Not really worth the price, imo its more of a 80-100ish range perfume (less even).<br />
Maybe the quality is great and the ingredients were handpicked from the garden of a castle and a lot of work was put into it or something that makes this a 200+eur perfume. But I just dont see it.<br />
<br />
Not a bad perfume but not worth its asking price.<br />
Would be a 9/10 at 70eur<br />
Is a 3/10 at 200+</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1994303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1994303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984032" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664226">another_52hz_whale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-24">11/24/23 06:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Everything from this brand seems quite overpriced and underperforming to me. The price can't be justified given the poor quality I am getting. Are we paying for the content or the tacky packaging? I don't get the hype at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1984032"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1984032#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1967643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1967643" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amnebe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amnebe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floral-Street/Wild-Vanilla-Orchid-47212.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47212.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wild Vanilla Orchid"title="Wild Vanilla Orchid"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1967643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1967643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213">amnebe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-03">11/03/23 07:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first sniff, this reminded me of Sand and Sable. But it has more complexity. I never really liked Sand and Sable, but there's a green tangerine component to it that makes the tuberose in this one interesting. I get cocoa butter vibes from it, too. I don't detect any wood at all. This perfume has a non-offensive type of soft scent that makes it easy to wear in public and during warm months.<br />
<br />
I've gone back to it again and again because the green citrus and tuberose mix is cravable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1967643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1967643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1958469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I find it very extremely alluring each time I take a whiff of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1958469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1958469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1911666" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1911666" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="geoljills"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756895"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1756895.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="geoljills" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Lalique-de-Lalique-20th-Anniversary-Chevrefeuille-Extrait-de-Parfum-15554.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15554.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lalique de Lalique 20th Anniversary Chevrefeuille Extrait de Parfum"title="Lalique de Lalique 20th Anniversary Chevrefeuille Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1911666ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1911666" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756895">geoljills</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 21:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I believe there are additional notes in this fragrance: pink peppercorn and mandarin, tuberose and jasmine, cashmeran and sandalwood. On my skin, the pink peppercorn is fairly intense, so I am surprised that the description on Fragrantica does not list it.<br />
I like this fragrance, but it is very sharp and spicy on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1911666"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1911666#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889102" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A good balance between the two.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1889102"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1889102#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1869517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1869517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863259" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1863259" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="feuermaiden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1684821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="feuermaiden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boy-Smells/Woodphoria-75837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woodphoria"title="Woodphoria"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1863259ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1863259" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821">feuermaiden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 21:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with most reviews on this one - definitely a soapy, tuberose bomb. It does dry down to a more woody base, but Im not a heavy florals fan so this is going to be a no for me. I dont detect any mandarin orange whatsoever - its just straight up tuberose.<br />
<br />
1/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1863259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1863259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1862797" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mdk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1756484.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mdk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-des-Sens-Eau-de-Toilette-35678.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35678.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"title="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1862797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1862797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484">Mdk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 08:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a fan of white flowers, as a fan of tuberose, I had high hopes for Helen in the portrait collection.<br />
But actually  unfortunately, no.<br />
Yes, it's tuberose.<br />
That's all.<br />
I can't find depth, complexity, perfumer skill or artistry in Helen.<br />
Of course, I can't find value for the price either.<br />
Simple tuberose fragrance.<br />
I don't see why you would buy this perfume unless you were mesmerized by the bottle.<br />
<br />
As the same tuberose perfume, I compared it with Nishane's Tuberoza.<br />
Despite the higher price of Helen, there was an overwhelming difference in the degree of perfection. Tuberoza has much more depth and perfection of fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1862797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1862797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1825375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1825375" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="leto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1825375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1825375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40660">leto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-05">05/05/23 05:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tuberose fragrance. That's it. Not much to talk about except it's painfully overpriced for what it offers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1825375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1825375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1790340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1790340" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1790340ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1790340" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-22">03/22/23 22:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a fun scent! She is scrumptious and adorable. I imagine a beautiful young bubbly girl dancing and giggling along the beaches of Bali. The tropical notes have got me just dancing and grinning like no tomorrow. The scent has this tangerine tropical gourmand top and middle note, with a vanilla like base note. The sillage is very much there as well as longevity. This scent I absolutely love, but wouldn't say it suit me or be a signature scent type of perfume. I would wear it if I'd be on a sunny vacation.<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
<br />
Libra Pisces Aries</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1790340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1790340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1787840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1787840" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabeyondobsessedemperor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1582152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabeyondobsessedemperor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1787840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1787840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152">dabeyondobsessedemperor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-20">03/20/23 02:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gives very much scented candle vibes. Also despite the listing here, I find it to be unisex. It's an overall pleasing and relaxing scent rooted in tuberose, and I think the opening is a work of art, with its soapy and indulgent citrus, but in the end I'm not sure it's a scent I'd like to wear or smell like. The scent profile has got a bizarre, waxy quality I can't quite put my finger on, hence the scented candle comment. It's sad that Heartless Helen had to be my first fragrance experience from Penhaligon's, because to a certain extent it is underwhelming for the price point. I'm sure Penhaligon's has fragrances of much higher quality and craft out there--I just have yet to try them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1787840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1787840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717360" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nice Tuberose with some citrus and a creamy woody dry-down. The tuberose gave the fragrance a more mature scent then id like but overall is pretty underwhelming.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1717360"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1717360#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717084" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its too sweet and cloying for me and the fact that the juice is bright blue does not help.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1717084"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1717084#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1701281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1639856" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rrruples"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1381161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rrruples" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1639856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1639856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381161">rrruples</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-06">09/06/22 22:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it's okay. initial thoughts: reminds me of marfa, but more restrained. marfa is like BAM shoving your face in a tuberose bouquet, but heartless helen is gentler like you're wearing a corsage that you pick whiffs of every now and then. mandarin takes a backseat to the agave in marfa, while it is riding shotgun next to tuberose in heartless helen.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Its not overly sweet.  As it mellows more of the woods come through. I get pear and tuberose mostly. I like it because it is different then other perfumes I have. Pear is not listed but thats the predominant scent I pick up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1573339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1573339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1569178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1569178" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zzaayyaannn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1508133"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1508133.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zzaayyaannn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1569178ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1569178" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1508133">zzaayyaannn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-22">05/22/22 14:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this! Im a big tuberose fan and this is basically tuberose in a bottle! <br />
It opens with a burst of mandarin, then it becomes a bit soapy. Once it dries down it slowly becomes sweeter as the scent progresses, the tuberose lives throughout the whole wear of the fragrance and has a slight green effect, the woody notes help balance out the tuberose and mandarin making it become a bit creamier.<br />
A very complex fragrance although it has 3 notes! <br />
One of my favourite from the portraits collection by Penhaligons, I recommend this for spring and summer. <br />
If you ever get the opportunity to try this, please do!!! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1569178"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1569178#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1565806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1459914" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tinker1960"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178066.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tinker1960" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1459914ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1459914" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); It is a mess.  And for the price it is robbery.  Smells like very old talc.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1459914"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1459914#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1457974" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1457974" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eckhardt Lee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414647"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414647.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eckhardt Lee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Gold-53401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Gold"title="Gentle Fluidity Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1457974ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1457974" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414647">Eckhardt Lee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-05">12/05/21 11:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>tuberose is the one and only white flowers that could attract my attention and wanting to put it on my skin. <br />
I like its boldness within white florals and somewhat divisive. Its full of character for me and thats very much my vibe. <br />
the opening mandarin makes it juicy and the drydown is having a milky creamy scent, which I would say making a great combo along with the tuberose. <br />
I actually wore this to my public exam back in high school and the grade Ive got on those 2 subjects which I wear this scent to take the exam is the highest among all subjects </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55442"comment_id="1457974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html?ccid=1457974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1447007" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1447007" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suavis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408750.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suavis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Puritas-61822.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61822.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Puritas"title="Puritas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1447007ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1447007" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408750">Suavis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-16">11/16/21 13:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a surprise present... I was naturally worried in case I didn't like it but I did!. <br />
The opening is a delicious splash of mandarine... beautiful and natural. The drydown reveals a milky tuberose, which is moderately sweet here, thank goodness! had it been a bit sweeter I would have given it to someone else. After a while I can smell the woodsy notes... it all blends really well because I can still get a whiff of mandarine after several hours.<br />
Longevity is great and sillage is good. I can still smell it in my clothes the following day and after I wash my clothes, I can smell this fragrance when I'm ironing...so yes...it stays with you. <br />
Many say it's for Summer days... I enjoy it whenever I'm in the mood for this creamy-mandarine-tuberose, like yesterday for instance, in the middle of autumn, it made me feel great!.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
